title: Courage
description: A Small Town, Sweet with Heat Romance.After catching her fiancé in bed with her boss, Everley’s life is completely upended. So, when the opportunity arises to buy her dream house in the countryside, it feels like fate has finally smiled on her. Until she arrives to find out the house is as much of a wreck as her love life. The only bright point in all of it is the dishy but damaged joiner who’s come to whip her crumbling house into shape. If only he could do the same with her life.Liam’s time in the army still haunts him. Since his final tour on the front lines he’s taken solace in the repetitive but exacting work of joinery. It allows him solitude, and it keeps the bills paid and the ghosts quiet.But the more he learns about his beautiful new client, and her heartache, the more she inspires him to tackle his own demons head on. And maybe even to dream of a future together. That is, until Everley’s cheating ex arrives in town, demanding a second chance.Can these two find their happily ever after together? Or will the burdens of their past prove too heavy to shift?
author: Nell Alexander
